title: Chemical Foundations of Drug Action: Integrated Online Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic chemistry and biology concepts
context.additional_context: Delivery of foundational pharmacological knowledge integrated with language education for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of chemical interactions of drugs.
Learners can analyze complex concepts by utilizing embedded prior knowledge (EPI) in online lecture materials.
Through project-based assessments, learners can apply drug action mechanisms to real educational scenarios.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
